description: React component implementing a chat message composer with input area, action buttons, file attachment handling, accessibility features, and UI interactions.

methods.name: Composer
methods.description: Main React component providing an interactive message input area with support for attachments, custom actions, and accessibility.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key press events in the textarea, submits message on Enter key (except Shift+Enter).

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles sending the user message, manages sending state and calls onSend callback.

methods.name: onFilesSelected
methods.description: Processes selected files, filters by extension, and calls onAttach callback.
